item.title: Constitution de la République Populaire de Chine
item.description: Constitution de la République Populaire de Chine (Adopted at the Fifth Session of the Fifth National People’s Congress and promulgated by the Announcement of the National People’s Congress on December 4, 1982; amended in accordance with the Amendment to the Constitution of the People’s Republic
